title: The Hogacre Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, British, English
description: Changed name from Hog Roast, this is a vegetarian restaurant located on Hogacre Common, a 14 acre eco park a 5-minute walk from the center of the city, and is next door to Oxgrow, Oxford's edible community garden. Sources local produce and those grown on-site. One day per week it offers soup, lunch food, cake, juices, coffee and tea.
